CustomField.description: The bookings amount minus ready-to-bill records and any pre-billed amount.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( pse__Bookings__c = 0.00, pse__Apply_Billing_Cap__c = false) , NULL , pse__Bookings__c - (pse__Billings__c + pse__Pre_Billed__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The bookings amount minus ready-to-bill records and any pre-billed amount.
CustomField.label: Remaining Amount
